s.text: Oh, wait, I know what it was--overwork.
(It's a heck of a bargain, but after the scalding and the lard rendering, I've pretty much had a full evening's porkertainment.)
A family photo, the single word "Noel," a naked babe draped in colored lights sipping champagne--there are many styles of holiday card, and now's the time to mail them.
(It gets dark so early when you lie in bed brooding until 2 in the afternoon.)
